programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards) S1 (11/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards»Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer) S1 (14/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en train) S3 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en train»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La journée des jeunes talents) S3 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La journée des jeunes talents»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage sur la Lune) S3 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage sur la Lune»Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grand-père à l'aire de jeux) S3 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Grand-père à l'aire de jeux»Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le Génie dans la bubulle) S5 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Le Génie dans la bubulle»Mr. Sea Bass shows the guppies beautiful gems. They are very precious, but a ghost from a lamp teaches them that some things are worth even more.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et les couleurs) S1 (17/20)
programme.desc: «Blue et les couleurs»Josh and Blue are painting a portrait of their friends, but it's not quite finished. We play Blue's Clues to figure out who else Blue wants to add to her painting. While looking for clues we skidoo to help out our color friends!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une soirée pyjama avec Blue) S1 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Une soirée pyjama avec Blue»It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (L'anniversaire d'Anani) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Anani»Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Island of Lost Things) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «The Island of Lost Things»When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante»Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Masked Fishy) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Masked Fishy»The Masked Fishy: When a masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark and William Watson must catch the culprit before opening night. (S1, ep 26a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pizza) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pizza»

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Il neige sur la jungle / Les cornichons explosifs) S5 (23/26)
programme.desc: «Il neige sur la jungle / Les cornichons explosifs»Mr. Porter and Alex go camping on a tropical island. When the weather suddenly turns, the Paw Patrol must come to their rescue. Mr. Porter has made his famous bridal dresses and delivers them all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington en Italie) S2 (20/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington en Italie»Paddington's Taste of Italy: Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream! (S2, ep 20b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue»Grandpa Big made a train! He is sure that it is the strongest little train in the world, but Grandpa Hond thinks that is nonsense. Until Miss Rabbit's bus gets stuck in the mud.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit train de Papy Pig) S2 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit train de Papy Pig»Papy Cochon construit un train et emmène Peppa et George pour un court voyage où ils vont rencontrer pleins d'amis...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Excursion en montagne) S2 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Excursion en montagne»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Secrets Box) S1 (31/78)
programme.desc: «The Secrets Box»Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's Robot) S1 (32/78)
programme.desc: «Bubu's Robot»Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'équipe pleine d'idées) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «L'équipe pleine d'idées»Clues house! While playing "superheroes" we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Alex et sa mini patrouille) S3 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Alex et sa mini patrouille»Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal»After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup) S2 (5/20)
programme.desc: «La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup»Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets) S1 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets»Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le champion de minigolf / Sans Pierrot) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Le champion de minigolf / Sans Pierrot»A selfish fish takes over the putt-putt in 'Daddy Shack', then in 'Rocky-Bye', Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky. (S1, ep 12).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William vs. Wild) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «William vs. Wild»After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (28/78)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (33/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»The Blue Butterfly: Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. (S1, ep 73).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Atchoum !) S1 (74/78)
programme.desc: «Atchoum !»Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Giant Strawberry) S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: «The Giant Strawberry»When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La maison de Rebecca Rabbit) S2 (39/52)
programme.desc: «La maison de Rebecca Rabbit»Peppa and her entire class go on a school trip to the mountains. There they discover the ultrasound, exchange their lunch and have a wonderful day. And before they get back they also sing the Bing-Bong song!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Alexandre le petit cousin) S2 (31/52)
programme.desc: «Alexandre le petit cousin»La cousine de Peppa et George vient d'avoir un petit frère. Alexandre est trop petit pour jouer. Peppa et George trouvent une idée pour s'amuser avec lui.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le sentier de randonnée) S2 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le sentier de randonnée»Suzie Sheep comes to play at Peppa's, together with her invisible friend Leo de Leeuw. Peppa has to get used to it, but soon she is playing Suzie's game, just like Papa and Mama Pig. Only George finds it difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami imaginaire) S2 (37/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami imaginaire»Suzy, le mouton, joue avec Peppa. Elle s'est inventé un ami imaginaire appelé Léo le lion. Peppa ne peut pas voir Léo ; Suzy lui révèle qu'il aime se déguiser...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Dog) S4 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Dog»Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit) S4 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit»Peppa and her friends are celebrating Freddy Fox's birthday at Grampy Rabbit's dinosaur themed park. Grampy takes them on a wild adventure and shows them some singing dinosaurs. The gang then follows dinosaur footprints to find a special surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une histoire pour George) S4 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Une histoire pour George»Bedtime Story: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story to help them fall asleep. When George wakes up again Peppa has to make up a bedtime story to get him back to sleep.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia»1.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (The Super Skateboard) S7 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Super Skateboard»It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mail Truck Blaze) S7 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Mail Truck Blaze»When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat) S5 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat»Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie) S5 (21/26)
programme.desc: «La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie»Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La danse de l'espace / Le croqueur de diamant) S2 (n°206)
programme.desc: «La danse de l'espace / Le croqueur de diamant»Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song in 'Satellite Flight', then in 'Diamond Geezer', Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond! (S2, ep 6).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Goodnight Central Forest) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Goodnight Central Forest»When Sir Steel does not want to get out of bed, Professor Scratch plunges the whole city into darkness with a gigantic pair of sunglasses.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards) S1 (11/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards»Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer) S1 (14/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.desc: «Le voyage en train»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La journée des jeunes talents) S3 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La journée des jeunes talents»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage sur la Lune) S3 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage sur la Lune»Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grand-père à l'aire de jeux) S3 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Grand-père à l'aire de jeux»Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.desc: «Le Génie dans la bubulle»Mr. Sea Bass shows the guppies beautiful gems. They are very precious, but a ghost from a lamp teaches them that some things are worth even more.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et les couleurs) S1 (17/20)
programme.desc: «Blue et les couleurs»Josh and Blue are painting a portrait of their friends, but it's not quite finished. We play Blue's Clues to figure out who else Blue wants to add to her painting. While looking for clues we skidoo to help out our color friends!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une soirée pyjama avec Blue) S1 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Une soirée pyjama avec Blue»It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (L'anniversaire d'Anani) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Anani»Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Island of Lost Things) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «The Island of Lost Things»When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante»Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Masked Fishy) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Masked Fishy»The Masked Fishy: When a masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark and William Watson must catch the culprit before opening night. (S1, ep 26a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pizza) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pizza»

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Il neige sur la jungle / Les cornichons explosifs) S5 (23/26)
programme.desc: «Il neige sur la jungle / Les cornichons explosifs»Mr. Porter and Alex go camping on a tropical island. When the weather suddenly turns, the Paw Patrol must come to their rescue. Mr. Porter has made his famous bridal dresses and delivers them all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington en Italie) S2 (20/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington en Italie»Paddington's Taste of Italy: Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream! (S2, ep 20b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Pig) S2 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Pig»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are best friends. But one day they have a quarrel, over a game of cards and decided they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up. When they finally say "sorry" to each other they realise that they will always be the best of friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La dispute) S2 (43/52)
programme.desc: «La dispute»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La balle rebondissante) S2 (48/52)
programme.desc: «La balle rebondissante»Peppa and George play with the ball until Suzie comes and they play tennis with it. But George doesn't like that. Fortunately, the friends come by and play a game of football. But a referee must be involved!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Remember-ator) S1 (35/78)
programme.desc: «The Remember-ator»Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Treasure Hunt) S1 (36/78)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt»Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf»Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?) S2 (n°207)
programme.desc: «La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?»It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band) S1 (17/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band»Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Il était une fois dans l'eau / Le monstre gluant) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Il était une fois dans l'eau / Le monstre gluant»When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La journée du oui) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «La journée du oui»Baby convinces Daddy to say "yup" to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Great Friendship Show) S1 (34/78)
programme.desc: «The Great Friendship Show»The Great Friendship Show: Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting. For Ron, it's poetry. (S1, ep 34).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Leaf Portraits) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «Leaf Portraits»When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Funny Photo) S1 (n°77)
programme.desc: «The Funny Photo»While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The Gift Box: The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. But he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift. (S1, ep 78).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Strawberries) S1 (1/78)
programme.desc: «Strawberries»Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Swing) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «The Swing»When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les étoiles) S2 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Les étoiles»George loves space and when he needs to sleep, he turns on his space mobile. Peppa doesn't understand that until Daddy Pig tells her about the stars. And when she gets to look through the telescope at Grandpa Pig, Peppa is over ... the space is super!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Travailler et s'amuser) S3 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Travailler et s'amuser»When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'arc en ciel) S3 (2/52)
programme.desc: «L'arc en ciel»Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toux de Pedro) S3 (3/52)
programme.desc: «La toux de Pedro»Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and some of the other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Peppa calls Doctor Brown Bear who gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La péniche) S5 (18/52)
programme.desc: «La péniche»Peppa et sa famille vont au musée. Peppa aime bien la galerie des portraits des rois et des reines, alors que George préfère le hall des dinosaures.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le nounours de la garderie) S4 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Le nounours de la garderie»George's New Dinosaur: George pays a visit to Mr Fox's Shop after his favourite toy, Mr Dinosaur breaks. With all the additional features surely Dino Roar is a good replacement?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !»Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Silence Please) S1 (52/52)
programme.desc: «Silence Please»Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Knights in Sparkling Armor) S7 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Knights in Sparkling Armor»When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (The Super Skateboard) S7 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Super Skateboard»It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Il faut sauver le moisso-matic / Faucon X le hardi) S5 (24/26)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver le moisso-matic / Faucon X le hardi»Farmer Yumi has a robot that helps with the corn harvest. That works great, until Chickaletta gets into the machine. Danny wears a bird suit as a mascot for the Adventure Bay basketball team. Two eagles thinks that he is a real bird.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc) S2 (8/20)
programme.desc: «La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc»Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?
